Q.1. WHAT IS YOUR RANK OR GRADE*   01. PRIVATE  02. PRIVATE FIRST CLASS  03. TECHNICIAN 5TH GRADE  04. CORPORAL  05. TECHNICIAN 4TH GRADE  06. SERGEANT  07. TECHNICIAN 3RD GRADE  08. STAFF SERGEANT  09. TECHNICAL SERGEANT  10. MASTER SERGEANT OR FIRST SERGEANT  11. OTHER  00. NO ANSWER

Q.2. IN WHAT STATE OF THE UNITED STATES DID YOU SPEND MOST OF THE PAST FIVE YEARS OF YOUR CIVILIAN LIFE*   01. NEW ENGLAND: CONNECTICUT, MAINE, MASSACHUSETTS, NEW HAMPSHIRE, RHODE ISLAND, VERMONT  02. MIDDLE ATLANTIC: NEW JERSEY, NEW YORK, PENNSYLVANIA  03. EAST NORTH CENTRAL: ILLINOIS, INDIANA, MICHIGAN, OHIO, WISCONSIN  04. WEST NORTH CENTRAL: IOWA, KANSAS, MINNESOTA, MISSOURI, NEBRASKA, NORTH DAKOTA, SOUTH DAKOTA  05. SOUTH ATLANTIC: DELAWARE, DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA, FLORIDA, GEORGIA, MARYLAND, NORTH CAROLINA, SOUTH CAROLINA, VIRGINIA, WEST VIRGINIA  06. EAST SOUTH CENTRAL: ALABAMA, KENTUCKY, MISSISSIPPI, TENNESSEE  07. WEST SOUTH CENTRAL: ARKANSAS, LOUISIANA, OKLAHOMA, TEXAS  08. MOUNTAIN: ARIZONA, COLORADO, IDAHO, MONTANA, NEVADA, NEW MEXICO, UTAH, WYOMING  09. PACIFIC: CALIFORNIA, OREGON, WASHINGTON  10. FOREIGN - U.S. POSSESSION  11. FOREIGN - NOT U.S.  12. U.S. - STATE NOT SPECIFIED  00. NO ANSWER
Q.3. HOW OLD WERE YOU ON YOUR LAST BIRTHDAY*   1.  YEARS OR YOUNGER  2.  YEARS  3.  TO  YEARS  4.  TO  YEARS  5.  TO  YEARS  6.  YEARS OR OVER  0. NO ANSWER

Q.4. HOW FAR DID YOU GO IN SCHOOL*   1. LESS THAN 6TH GRADE  2. FINISHED 6TH GRADE  3. FINISHED 7TH GRADE  4. FINISHED 8TH GRADE  5. SOME HIGH SCHOOL OR TRADE SCHOOL  6. GRADUATED FROM HIGH SCHOOL  7. SOME COLLEGE BUT DID NOT FINISH  8. COLLEGE GRADUATE  0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTIONS  AND  CODED TOGETHER.

Q.5. ARE YOU SINGLE, MARRIED, DIVORCED, WIDOWED OR SEPARATED*  Q.6. IF YOU ARE MARRIED, DID YOU GET MARRIED BEFORE OR AFTER ENTERING THE ARMY*   1. SINGLE  2. DIVORCED  3. WIDOWED  4. SEPARATED  5. MARRIED, BEFORE ENTERING THE ARMY  6. MARRIED, AFTER ENTERING THE ARMY  7. MARRIED, NO ANSWER  0. NO ANSWER
Q.7. IF YOU ARE OR HAVE BEEN MARRIED, HOW MANY CHILDREN DO YOU HAVE*   1. ONE  2. TWO  3. THREE OR MORE  4. NONE  9. INAPPLICABLE, NO ANSWER
Q.8. HOW LONG HAVE YOU BEEN IN THE ARMY*   1.  MONTHS OR LESS  2. OVER  MONTHS UP TO  MONTHS  3. OVER  MONTHS UP TO  YEAR  4. OVER  YEAR  0. NO ANSWER
Q.9. WHEN YOU ENTERED THE ARMY, DID YOU COME IN AS A:   1. DRAFTEE THROUGH SELECTIVE SERVICE  2. VOLUNTEER  3. MEMBER OF THE NATIONAL GUARD  0. NO ANSWER

Q.10. WHAT BRANCH OF SERVICE ARE YOU IN*   01. CAVALRY  02. ENGINEERS  03. INFANTRY  04. FIELD ARTILLERY  05. SIGNAL CORPS  06. MEDICAL CORPS  07. ORDNANCE DEPARTMENT  08. QUARTERMASTER CORPS  09. ARMORED FORCE (TANK CORPS)  10. CHEMICAL WARFARE  11. AIR CORPS  00. NO ANSWER

Q.11. WHAT WAS YOUR MAIN CIVILIAN OCCUPATION*   01. PROFESSIONAL OR SEMI-PROFESSIONAL OCCUPATION (I.E. DOCTORS, DENTISTS, LAWYERS, TEACHERS, ENGINEERS, SOCIAL WORKERS, ETC.)  02. CLERICAL AND SALES OCCUPATIONS (I.E. BOOKKEEPERS, CLERKS, TELEPHONE OPERATORS, ETC.)  03. SERVICE OCCUPATIONS (I.E. DOMESTIC SERVICE: COOKS, SERVANTS, ETC.; PERSONAL SERVICE: DOORMEN, USHERS, BEAUTICIANS, BARBERS, SHIP-STEWARDS, ETC.; PROTECTIVE SERVICES: FIREMEN, POLICEMEN, GUARDS, ETC.)  04. AGRICULTURE, FISHERY, AND FORESTRY (EXCEPT LOGGING) (I.E. FARMERS, FISHERMEN, HUNTERS AND TRAPPERS)  05. SKILLED OCCUPATIONS (I.E. CARPENTERS, PRESSMEN, TYPOGRAPHERS, WEAVERS, JEWELERS, TOOLMAKERS, ETC.)  06. SEMI-SKILLED OCCUPATIONS  07. UNSKILLED OCCUPATIONS (INCLUDING FACTORY WORKERS, JOB NOT SPECIFIED)  08. MANAGERIAL AND OFFICIALS (HIGHER TYPE)  09. MERCHANTS, SHOPKEEPERS, TRADESMEN, ETC.  10. STUDENT  11. MISCELLANEOUS UNCLASSIFIABLE  12. UNEMPLOYED (INCLUDING CCC, WPA, ETC.)  00. NO ANSWER

Q.12. WHAT KIND OF WORK WOULD YOU LIKE TO DO AFTER THE WAR*   1. STAY IN ARMY OR ANYTHING ELSE, PLUS STAY IN ARMY  2. SAME GENERAL LINE AS BEFORE  3. NEW OCCUPATION  4. OTHER  5. NO IDEA OR DON,T KNOW  0. NO ANSWER
Q.13. WHAT KIND OF A CHANCE DO YOU THINK YOU WILL HAVE OF ACTUALLY DOING THIS KIND OF WORK*   1. GOOD  2. FAIR  3. POOR  4. UNCERTAIN  0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 13A NOT CODED.

Q.14A. BEFORE THE WAR, DID YOU HAVE THE SAME JOB PLANS FOR THE FUTURE THAT YOU HAVE NOW*  Q.14B. IF BEFORE THE WAR YOUR JOB PLANS WERE DIFFERENT FROM NOW, WHAT DID YOU THEN HAVE IN MIND*   1. NO, CONTINUE IN SAME JOB AS BEFORE  2. NO, PLANNED TO ADVANCE IN SOME LINE OF WORK AS BEFORE E.G. "GO INTO BUSINESS FOR MYSELF", "BECOME PARTNER IN FIRM FOR WHICH I WAS SALESMAN"  3. NO, CONTINUE EDUCATION  4. NO, PLANNED TO GO INTO A DIFFERENT JOB  5. NO, STAY IN THE ARMY A WHILE, THEN GO BACK TO WORK  6. NO, NOTHING DEFINITE, UNCERTAIN  7. NO, NO ANSWER  8. YES TO PART A  0. NO ANSWER

Q.15. DO YOU FEEL THAT YOU NEED ANY MORE FORMAL EDUCATION IN ORDER TO DO WHAT YOU WANT TO DO AFTER THE WAR*   1. YES, IT IS ABSOLUTELY NECESSARY  2. YES, IT WOULD BE QUITE IMPORTANT  3. NO, NOT NEEDED  4. NOT SURE WHAT I WILL WANT TO DO  0. NO ANSWER

Q.32. WHICH OF THE FOLLOWING STATEMENTS BEST TELLS THE WAY YOU FEEL ABOUT GETTING INTO THE FIGHTING*   01. I,M READY TO GO AND I WANT TO GET INTO THE REAL FIGHTING SOON  02. I,D LIKE TO GET IN ON THE FIGHTING, BEFORE IT,S OVER, BUT I DON,T THINK I,M READY YET  03. I HOPE I WON,T HAVE TO GO, BUT IF I DO, I THINK I,LL DO ALL RIGHT  04. I HOPE I WON,T HAVE TO GO BECAUSE I DON,T THINK I,LL EVER BE GOOD AS A FIGHTER  05. TOO OLD FOR COMBAT DUTY  06. NOT PHYSICALLY FIT FOR COMBAT DUTY  07. SHOULD BE IN WAR INDUSTRY  08. NO ANSWER X. QUESTION  NOT CODED.
